title: Hyper-Content-Based Independent Learning Material Development: Expert Master Guide Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of instructional design principles and experience utilizing digital learning environments
context.additional_context: Social role reinforcement training for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can produce hypermedia content using a combined design framework based on the Derek Rowntree model and the Borg & Gall model.
Learners can execute a material development process validated by experts (content, media, language, design) with 85% accuracy.
Learners can verify the effectiveness of materials through three-stage evaluation group testing (individual → small group → large group).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
